UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.
The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Enhanced antimicrobial activity of novel synthetic peptides derived from vejovine and hadrurin.
Literature.Author: Sánchez-Vásquez L, Silva-Sanchez J, Jiménez-Vargas J, Rodríguez-Romero A, Muñoz-Garay C, Rodríguez MC, Gurrola GB, Possani LD

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=665 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cell death=46 µM,Human COS-7 cells:50% Cell death=44 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=3.1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.6µM),Escherichia coli 170(MIC=3.1µM),Enterobacter cloacae 2524(MIC=6.2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae 913(MIC=3.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 4677(MIC=25µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=25µM),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=1.6-6.2µM),Plasmodium berghei(40-50% Inhibition=5µM),Escherichia coli 5580(MIC=1.6µM),Enterobacter cloacae 6266(MIC=3.1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae 1625(MIC=1.6µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae 68228(MIC=6.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 5106(MIC=12µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 3599(MIC=50µM)
